summary.en: Document Illustrator is an AI-powered tool that intelligently analyzes documents and generates multiple stylized illustrations. It features three built-in stylesâ€”gradient glass, ticket, and vector illustrationâ€”with support for 16:9 and 3:4 aspect ratios, ideal for social media platforms like Xiaohongshu and Twitter.

summary.en: nanobot is an ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant with only ~4,000 lines of core codeâ€”99% smaller than alternatives. It supports multiple chat platforms (Telegram, Discord, Slack, etc.), LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepSeek, etc.), and MCP protocol, featuring intelligent memory, task scheduling, code generation, and real-time analysis for both research and production use.
